column1: sentence
A circus truck driver refused to tow the line.
A dentist has to tell a patient the whole truth.
A handlebar mustache may look ridiculous, but symmetrical eyelashes are even sillier.
A man used money that he had inherited from his late father and put an addition on his house. It was an hair extension.
A men's wear store has opening and closing times.
A paramedic got a new job as a chauffeur: an ambulance driver.
A pet store had a bird contest with no purchase necessary.
A pun is its own reward.
A rubber band pistol was confiscated from algebra class because it was a weapon of mass disruption.
A thief who stole cutlery without leaving a clue was called the 'stainless steeler.'
After getting pranked by his friends and getting hit with a basket, Aron knew they had a wicked sense of humour.
Aliens are lovable because they're so special.
An astronaut gets to take a turn as a world traveler.
As a young boy, Brutus' mother often cautioned him not to run with scissors.
Astronauts like to do lunch.
At a flower show the first prize is often a blue ribbon.
At a pet store: 'buy one dog, get one free'.
Be kind to your dentist because he has feelings too.
Bell, Bark and Kennel, a novel by Ivan Pavlov, chronicles the birth of the Salvation Army.
Dentists don't like a hard day at the office.
Even though Ashley was blind and under arrest, she still had hope that someone would bail her out.
Even though he contributes either the X or Y chromosome, when a father chooses the sex of his child it's just a spur of the moment decision.
For children to eat without washing their hands would be a crime.
Grandparents faces are full of pock marks.
He labored so hard that he worked his fingers to the bones.
I keep reading 'The Lord of the Rings' over and over. I guess it's just force of habit.
I like the latest horror movie so much that I've arranged a private screening.
I like to stay current with the electrifying adventures of Sherlock Holmes.
I need to do my philosophy homework but I just can't.
If a barista is not allowed to make espresso she will lose her temper.
If you spend too much time in the coffee shop you'll be late for work.
If you write bad things about me I am liable to sue you.
In the novel, there is an unexpected secret meeting of the lovers. It is a plot twist.
Inflammatory talk is often seen as profane language.
John plans to retire in the spring and, like the trees around us, will be leaving.
Just in time for Thanksgiving a blockbuster movie about sweet potatoes, 'The Silence of the Lambs'.
Last night, I kept dreaming that I had written Lord of the Rings. The wife said I'd been talking in my sleep.
Many people are strongly attracted to a magnet.
Many people think that Edgar Allan Poe was a raving madman.
My battery had an alcohol problem, so it went to AA meetings.
My boss does not tolerate any beards or mustaches. He is a real slave driver.
My heart starts aching when Clay sings.
My neighbor's sprinkler is a constant irritation to me.
My two uncles bet who would get married first. Then one upped the ante.
New years resolution for the bankrupt gardener was to forget the past and rely on the future.
On organic farms they tell it like it is.
One real estate agent said to another, "How's it going?"
People have a happy time vacationing in Ireland because they are walking on fire.
People in Switzerland can't learn to ski without a lot of help.
Scarecrows are always guarding their patch.
Selling coffee has its perks for those who have been so lucky.
Sign on a broken perfume bottle, "Out of order".
Sign: 'Please turn out the lights. Thanks a lot.'
Some childen are often on their best behavior.
Some people have to get up for work at the crack of dawn.
Some planes are so cramped that passengers suffer jet lag.
Ten years without brushing causes horrible tooth decay.
The actor was never quite right after he retired. He had Post Traumatic Stress Disorder.
The English Teacher felt odd after being fired: it was post traumatic stress disorder.
The garden club visited the nursery and found themselves in a hostile environment.
The Irish should be rich because their capital is always doubling.
The optical scientist who stole his colleague's bifocals was sentenced to three years in a state prison.
The plumber explained that the problem in my kitchen was just water under the bridge.
The robber baron was a commander in chief.
The satellite went into orbit on January 1st causing a new year's resolution.
The twin girls rented flora to offices. They called their business 'Sisterhood of the Traveling Pants'.
There was a dentist who was convicted of insider trading.
They were the quietest burglars in the history of New York City. The newspapers called them 'Criminal minds.'
Tinker Bell was arrested for being suspiciously high. But in the end she was only fined for littering.
To become a pilot requires a good attitude.
To some Christmas is about other people's presents.
Vampires are always looking for their next victim.
What does a villain call his silverware? Weapons of mass distruction.
What would be the brand name of the highest quality copy paper money could buy? The cream of the crop!
What you see is what you get.
When she made Mario Puzo's books required reading for her class, she made him an offer they couldn't refuse.
When the crop was destroyed, there was no more cranberry sauce.
When you use glue in class it pays to be careful.
Why are Italians so good at making coffee? Because they really know how to express themselves.
Women who wear $200.00 perfume obviously are known to have no common sense.
